title: Nightly builds
contents:
Nightly buildslink

Nightly builds are provided to allow developers to use the latest features that haven't been released yet. The nightly builds of each package are published on each successful build of the master branch. Use the installation instructions below for each respective package.

Storelink

npm install github:ngrx/store-builds yarn add github:ngrx/store-builds

Store Devtoolslink

npm install github:ngrx/store-devtools-builds yarn add github:ngrx/store-devtools-builds

Effectslink

npm install github:ngrx/effects-builds yarn add github:ngrx/effects-builds

Router Storelink

npm install github:ngrx/router-store-builds yarn add github:ngrx/router-store-builds

Entitylink

npm install github:ngrx/entity-builds yarn add github:ngrx/entity-builds

Schematicslink

npm install github:ngrx/schematics-builds --save-dev yarn add github:ngrx/schematics-builds --dev
